entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tadoule Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:41 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023
